ResumeParserData.Experience: Smith & Sons Construction Bricklayer  Manchester, UK  2020 - Present  At Smith & Sons Construction, I work on various residential and commercial projects, laying bricks and blocks to create structures according to specifications. I collaborate closely with site managers and other tradespeople to ensure projects are completed on time and to a high standard.  Key Responsibilities :   Laying bricks, blocks, and stones for walls, foundations, and other structures.  Mixing mortar and grout and spreading it onto work surfaces.  Interpreting blueprints and drawings to ensure accurate construction.  Cutting bricks to size using hammers, chisels, and power tools.  Repairing and maintaining existing brick structures.  Ensuring all work complies with health and safety regulations.  Assisting with site preparation and clean-up activities.  Brown & Co. Builders Apprentice Bricklayer  Manchester, UK    2017 - 2020  During my apprenticeship at Brown & Co. Builders, I learned the fundamentals of bricklaying under the supervision of experienced bricklayers. I gained hands-on experience in various aspects of masonry work, including laying bricks, mixing mortar, and interpreting construction plans.  Key Responsibilities :   Assisting senior bricklayers with brick and block laying tasks.  Mixing and applying mortar to work surfaces.  Learning to read and interpret construction drawings and blueprints.  Preparing and maintaining work areas and tools.  Following health and safety guidelines on site.  Developing skills in measuring, cutting, and shaping bricks.

JobProfile.Title: Smith & Sons Construction Bricklayer
JobProfile.Alias: mason, bricklaying contractor, brick stacker, brick layer, brick laying worker, brickmaker, auxiliary mason, brick laying labourer

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
At Smith & Sons Construction, I work on various residential and commercial projects, laying bricks and blocks to create structures according to specifications. I collaborate closely with site managers and other tradespeople to ensure projects are completed on time and to a high standard. 
 Key Responsibilities : 
 Laying bricks, blocks, and stones for walls, foundations, and other structures. 
 Mixing mortar and grout and spreading it onto work surfaces. 
 Interpreting blueprints and drawings to ensure accurate construction. 
 Cutting bricks to size using hammers, chisels, and power tools. 
 Repairing and maintaining existing brick structures. 
 Ensuring all work complies with health and safety regulations. 
 Assisting with site preparation and clean-up activities.

JobProfile.Title: Builders Apprentice Bricklayer
JobProfile.Alias: mason, bricklaying contractor, brick stacker, brick layer, brick laying worker, brickmaker, auxiliary mason, brick laying labourer

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
During my apprenticeship at Brown & Co. Builders, I learned the fundamentals of bricklaying under the supervision of experienced bricklayers. I gained hands-on experience in various aspects of masonry work, including laying bricks, mixing mortar, and interpreting construction plans. 
 Key Responsibilities : 
 Assisting senior bricklayers with brick and block laying tasks. 
 Mixing and applying mortar to work surfaces. 
 Learning to read and interpret construction drawings and blueprints. 
 Preparing and maintaining work areas and tools. 
 Following health and safety guidelines on site. 
 Developing skills in measuring, cutting, and shaping bricks.

ResumeParserData.Summary: Skilled and reliable bricklayer with 7 years of hands-on experience in the construction industry. Proficient in laying bricks, blocks, and stones to construct or repair walls, foundations, partitions, arches, and other structures. Known for strong work ethic, attention to detail, and commitment to high-quality workmanship.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: John has an experience in the domain of 'Construction', particularly in the sub-domain of 'Brickmasons, Blockmasons, and Stonemasons. 'The candidate has a total experience of 7 Years

John Herring
Contact Information : 
Address : 15 Oak Street, Manchester, M21 3AA, England
Email : john.herring@email.com
Phone : +44 7123 456789

Professional Summary : Skilled and reliable bricklayer with 7 years of hands-on experience in the construction industry. Proficient in laying bricks, blocks, and stones to construct or repair walls, foundations, partitions, arches, and other structures. Known for strong work ethic, attention to detail, and commitment to high-quality workmanship.

Education : Manchester High School
GCSEs in Mathematics, English, and Design Technology
Graduated : 2017

Professional Experience : 
Smith & Sons Construction Bricklayer
Manchester, UK
2020 - Present
At Smith & Sons Construction, I work on various residential and commercial projects, laying bricks and blocks to create structures according to specifications. I collaborate closely with site managers and other tradespeople to ensure projects are completed on time and to a high standard.
Key Responsibilities : 
Laying bricks, blocks, and stones for walls, foundations, and other structures.
Mixing mortar and grout and spreading it onto work surfaces.
Interpreting blueprints and drawings to ensure accurate construction.
Cutting bricks to size using hammers, chisels, and power tools.
Repairing and maintaining existing brick structures.
Ensuring all work complies with health and safety regulations.
Assisting with site preparation and clean-up activities.
Brown & Co. Builders Apprentice Bricklayer
Manchester, UK

2017 - 2020
During my apprenticeship at Brown & Co. Builders, I learned the fundamentals of bricklaying under the supervision of experienced bricklayers. I gained hands-on experience in various aspects of masonry work, including laying bricks, mixing mortar, and interpreting construction plans.
Key Responsibilities : 
Assisting senior bricklayers with brick and block laying tasks.
Mixing and applying mortar to work surfaces.
Learning to read and interpret construction drawings and blueprints.
Preparing and maintaining work areas and tools.
Following health and safety guidelines on site.
Developing skills in measuring, cutting, and shaping bricks.

Skills : 
Bricklaying and Masonry : Proficient in laying bricks, blocks, and stones to construct or repair structures.
Blueprint Interpretation : Skilled in reading and interpreting construction plans and blueprints.
Mortar Mixing : Experienced in mixing mortar and grout for masonry work.
Tool Handling : Competent in using hand and power tools for cutting, shaping, and laying bricks.
Detail-Oriented : Strong attention to detail to ensure high-quality workmanship.
Physical Stamina : Able to perform physically demanding tasks for extended periods.
Safety Compliance : Knowledgeable about health and safety regulations and practices in construction.

Qualifications : 
NVQ Level 2 in Trowel Occupations (Bricklaying) 
CSCS (Construction Skills Certification Scheme) Card
First Aid Certification
Manual Handling Training
